Nice and clean layout. Nice use of color. _blank_ is missing and needs to be primary information.

Too much dead space here, should condense the _blank_ or move the central text to the left a little.

Is this a graphic of _blank_? Or a _blank_? Not sure what's going on down here.

great colors and typeface

poor color choice barely legible

very clear, nice design

comments.comment: Currently, the font, colors and line elements are coming across very 'stock' and not custom or current.

I feel like the fonts used here are somewhat bland and don't really grab the attention.
This _blank_ is difficult to understand.

Too many conflicting visuals.

Use a different color text to make this statement stand out more
this info has to be centered to its respective space
Unnecessary information.
You lost the _blank_.
The vital information in the _blank_ is all jumbled together.
The graphics are really all over the place, and lack a streamlined look.
Cannot read.

Overall, you need to work with the spacing with this design. Too much dead space. Don't let it go to waste. Use it!

dead space on top. The visual information is packed with great information but that particular space is too much to be breathing space.

Too small. Enlarge so that it is legible.

Very nice structure and organization. Box for _blank_ and box for _blank_ feels a little detached.

good use of color, relaxing theme if a little too cute.
